AI.task: Learn Python basics and implement simple if-else logic for decision making.
Implement a basic rule-based chatbot using Python.
Train a basic neural network using a framework like TensorFlow or PyTorch on MNIST dataset.
Build a simple AI model that performs sentiment analysis using pre-trained embeddings.
Design and deploy a Transformer-based AI model (like BERT) for text classification on custom data.

ML.task: Understand and implement linear regression from scratch.
Train and evaluate models using scikit-learn (e.g., decision trees, KNN).
Work on real-world datasets (e.g., Titanic, Housing) and perform data preprocessing and feature engineering.
Optimize model performance using cross-validation and hyperparameter tuning.
Build and deploy an end-to-end ML pipeline with model versioning and CI/CD.

DS.task: Learn basic statistics and data visualization with Python (Matplotlib, Seaborn).
Clean and preprocess datasets using Pandas and NumPy.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) and generate insights from real-world data.
Create dashboards and interactive reports using tools like Tableau or Power BI.
Design a data pipeline and implement it using Apache Airflow or similar tools.

Cloud Computing.task: Understand basics of cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, GCP) and create a free-tier account.
Deploy a static website using AWS S3 or Azure Blob Storage.
Set up and configure a virtual machine using EC2 or similar.
Use cloud services to host a web application with a managed database and monitoring.
Design and implement a scalable microservices architecture using Kubernetes and CI/CD pipelines.

Web Development.task: Build a basic HTML/CSS personal webpage.
Create a responsive website with JavaScript interactions.
Build a CRUD application using a modern front-end framework (React, Vue).
Integrate the front end with a REST API and implement authentication.
Develop and deploy a full-stack application with scalable backend and frontend using Docker and CI/CD.

App Development.task: Set up the development environment and build a simple Hello World mobile app.
Create a multi-screen app with navigation and basic state management.
Consume an external API to display dynamic data (e.g., weather or news app).
Implement user authentication and local storage in the app.
Build and publish a production-ready cross-platform app with analytics and push notifications.

Project Management.task: Understand basics of Agile and Scrum. Participate in daily standups.
Create a simple Gantt chart or Kanban board for a small project.
Manage sprints and track progress using tools like Jira or Trello.
Handle resource planning, risk assessment, and communication with stakeholders.
Lead a cross-functional team on a full lifecycle project and deliver reports to executives.
